title: Strengthening Organizational Development Practical Competencies: COVID-19 Context Awareness and Collaboration Through Remote Chemistry Experiments

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Students can analyze the properties of biological molecules using remote lab tools and share results on a collaboration platform.
Students can systematically explain the scientific inquiry process by designing and conducting experiments on virus-related topics, including COVID-19.
Students can synthesize experimental data and propose solutions to social issues through collaboration with team members in a PBL environment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
